Discovered repositories from the open source frontier

View the Project on GitHub

bitsandbytes-foundation/bitsandbytes

bitsandbytes is a PyTorch library providing 8-bit and 4-bit quantization and optimizers for reducing memory use in large language model training and inference

View on index

Related repos

  • Code and tutorials for building large language models from scratch in PyTorch
  • Data analysis platform using large language models
  • minimal PyTorch code for training your own small language model from scratch
  • PyTorch deep learning course files and code notebooks
  • reinforcement learning library for training large language models, supports many RL algorithms, integrates with LLM tools, scales to models with up to 671B parameters
  • Draws graph of Python data structures
  • RAG with memory - processes up to 1M tokens and generates contextual clues from global understanding
  • run large language models on any device
